etymologies: 2004: with allusion to Swift Boat Veterans for Truth, a political action committee that funded an advertising campaign criticizing 2004 US presidential candidate Senator John Kerry's record of military service aboard a swift boat, a type of US Navy patrol craft, during the Vietnam War

definitions: target (a politician or public figure) with a campaign of personal attacks

examples.text: when he got swift-boated, his campaign staffers didn't sit silently
organized smearing and swift-boating of public figures

shortDefinitions: target politician or public figure with campaign of personal attacks
